lines.text: Hi kids. I'm Buster Bunny.
And I'm Babs Bunny.
No relation.
I'm tired of dating silly, immature little boys. I'd like to meet a sophisticated older guy with a special affinity for rabbits.
This place is supposed to be wild, crazy, and completely out of control!
[beat]
Hope I'm not bored.

[as BatDuck]
I feel pretty.

[after doing a montage of impersonations]
Help... I fallen and I can't get up...
Pandemonium doesn't reign around here... it pours.

[gets hit by an anvil]
Ah... That actually felt... good...
Here's a little ditty.
Ditty what?
Ditty pay you for that joke?

[after seeing Montana Max cut rabbit actors down with a chainsaw]
Oh that's sick!
Boo! Get it off.
Hey what are you doing? Put me down. This will be a Christmas classic.
[after being thrown out of the theater]
THIS IS CENSORSHIP! I'LL SUE!
Shrink our heroes.
That's so crazy it just might work.
That's Cliché #2.

[annoyed by Hampton's lackluster performance on his movie set]
Gimmie that. You just open up the can and say "ahh mango juice."
[mast falls on top of Plucky]

[while babysitting Sneezer, he is about to sneeze]
Why me?
I'll love them, and hug them and hold them forever!
